DOC.brief_summary: The investigation multi-year observational study follow completion open-label , single dose Phase I/II study involve transplantation allogeneic HuCNS-SC cell 12 subject thoracic spinal cord injury . Subjects monitor routine interval safety preliminary efficacy 5 year post-transplantation Phase I/II investigation CL-N02-SC .
